name: StartBolita
description: StartBolita is a game of puzzle based on Dodge and move boxes of colors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: 2.4 Ghz+ Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit or Newer Processor: 3.0 GHz+ Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 760 or Radeon 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
